content:
But right now, what I want most
is something with the aroma of black tea,
yet refreshingly cold and smoothâ€”iced black tea!

Rainbow slushies! You mentioned something truly mysterious.
Every time I taste those layers of different flavors hidden beneath the ice,
it feels like my taste buds are going on an adventure.

A delightful glass of lemonade, with some extra ice.
Sweet and sour, refreshingly cool - just the thing to perk you up.
Say... are you feeling sleepy right now?

Phew, it's so hot... A nice cold drink would hit the spot right now.
{me},
Would you like some <color=#8AAB4B>refreshments</color>?

We're so in sync!
Nothing beats a fragrant cup of hot black tea
after a long, tiring day.
